tasks.label: Infra: Check bastion
tasks.command: ssh -o BatchMode=yes -o ConnectTimeout=7 bastion "bash -lc 'printf ""HOST: ""; hostname; printf ""IP: ""; hostname -I; uptime; curl -I -s https://github.com | head -n 1'"
